manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cooking Presets Take the guesswork out of cooking popular foods like popcorn and frozen vegetables. At the touch of a button your favorite foods will be cooked according to our preset power levels. Emerson’s space saving countertop microwave oven offers 1000 watts and 1.3 cubic feet of cooking space with a stainless-steel finish in front and black cabinet. 11 different power levels and 6 one touch settings with speed and weight defrost LED display, clock, kitchen timer and child-safe lock. Cooking your favorite meals and snacks has never been easier! Measures: 20.4"x17.2"x12.3H" and weight is 35.9 lbs. Microwave Output Power: 1000 Watts • 1.3 cu. ft. of Cooking Space • Stainless Steel Front and Black Cabinet • 11 Microwave Power Levels • 6 Pre-programmed Recipes (Popcorn, Potato, Pizza, Frozen Vegetable, Beverage, Dinner Plate) • 99-Minutes, 99-Second Digital Timer • Time and Weight defrost • LED display, Digital clock • Removable Glass Turntable for Complete, Even Cooking • Child-Safe Lock-Out feature • End-of-Cooking Signal • Unit dimension WxDxH: 20.4”x17.2”x12.3” (519x438x313mm)
AUTO COOK MENUS PopcornPotatoPizzaFrozen VegetableBeverageDinner Plate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Delivery was on time . It is big inside plenty of room. The 1000 watts is perfect . Heats up quickly as it should . Buttons are nice size easy to read and push . For me it was about the size inside . 1.3 to me is perfect . Just received it today using it alot already. Definitely recommend both brand and size . This is not a small microwave but fits perfectly in corner of kitchen counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars IT WORKED FOR OVER 10 YEARS!
reviews.reviewText: Only a 1000 watts, irritating warning beeps, BUT it worked religiously for 10 years, although the turning rotor sort of got too loud so I just took out that removable thing that made the glass plate turn, but it still worked. So I bought the EXACT SAME MODEL, "Emerson mw1161sb." $100, how can you go wrong, that is, unless this is a refurbished model! I purchased my original one in Walmart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beware of the Delivery Gorillas, apparently new to handing valuable and fragile items..
reviews.reviewText: Had to send the first one back, at it arrived having looked like it took a direct hit from a Scud missile.. The second one arrived with the box in even worse condition, but the unit miraculously seems to be operating well. It sounds a bit different, which makes us concerned that the apparent Gorillas handling these shipments may have damaged it, but with a 1 year warranty, we'll have to see how she holds up..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: As a person who doesn't necessarily go for brand names but on affordability and performance, I got this because I had an old Emerson I had used for 9 years without any issues. I got this as a replacement because a friend told me microwave ovens shouldn't be used more than 5 years. Price is also lower than competitors with similar size and function. So far so good just like my old one. Noice level is low and does an excellent heating up my food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works really well and heats food fast!
reviews.reviewText: I am coming off of using a 30 year old microwave, and this one is like magic. It cooks most things in 30 seconds or less and I have had no problems with it! I was a little worried about size since it just sits on the counter, but it is small enough in size that it doesnt take up too much counter space but still has plenty of room inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Quieter than our previous microwave. Does well except for single Mac and cheese. Don’t know why it struggles to heat them evenly or well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2019
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: 12/26/19 Still waiting on resolution. I contacted Amazon who said that because I had the Asurion protection plan I would have to contact them. Contacted Asurion who told me to cut the cord off the back of the microwave, peel the item sticker off the back, include a letter with a description of the problem and the case number, and mail to Emerson. Emerson would send me a new microwave.Emerson received the cord,etc. on Dec. 11. I have had no response from them. So I contacted Amazon again. They are trying to be helpful but are not listening, or else not understanding. I have repeated the whole story numerous times. Today I received a mailing label to mail the microwave back and they would refund my money. The microwave went to the trash after it had its cord cut off!! I cannot mail it back, as I’ve said many times! I’m frustrated and will give Emerson one more chance today. Will keep you updated, if anyone is interested....Initial review, 3 stars:The oven worked perfectly—it heated correctly, the turntable turned, etc. the problem was with the metal housing. When the oven was in use the housing would rattle loudly. You could make it stop if you pressed against the the side of the oven. But as soon as you’d let go the noise was back. Since I don’t like standing in front of the microwave while it’s in use I elected to return it. I’m currently waiting on a replacement.To sum up: the oven worked fine, the metal housing was faulty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have owned this product for three years now, no problems, works well. Easy to clean and always looks good.
Les mesures sont mal décrites sur l'annonce. J'ai bien pris mes mesures et je le pensais plus gros.Je le trouve trop petit, mais il fonctionne bien.
